Current Events: Year-Round Fun at Bee's RV Resort
Experience the vibrant lifestyle at Bee's RV Resort in Clermont, Florida's premier destination for active RV enthusiasts. Our year-round calendar of exciting events transforms your Florida luxury RV resort stay into an unforgettable adventure. From our monthly classic car shows to seasonal celebrations, there's always something happening that brings our community together. Whether you're planning a short getaway, an extended winter escape, or considering a permanent home base in sunny Florida, our dynamic events program ensures every day feels like a vacation.
May Events 2025
Events Calander
Monthly Event
Bee's Classic Car Show
Rev up your weekend at Bee's Classic Car Show, a beloved monthly tradition at our Florida RV resort! Every first Saturday of the month, from 3:00 PM to 6:00 PM, our grounds transform into a spectacular showcase of automotive history and innovation. Marvel at an impressive display of gleaming classic cars, powerful muscle cars, and sleek sports cars that tell the story of America's love affair with the automobile.
Make it your monthly family tradition as you stroll through rows of meticulously maintained vehicles while enjoying the sounds of live entertainment by Sam Metro. Bring your favorite picnic spread or sample delicious offerings from our featured food trucks. The show has become more than just a car exhibition – it's a social hub where car enthusiasts and families come together to share stories, make lasting friendships, and create memories in our welcoming Clermont RV resort community.
Plan Your Stay at Florida's Premier RV Resort Community
Book Your Stay
Ready to experience the excitement of Bee's RV Resort's event-filled lifestyle? Contact us today to book your stay at one of Florida's most dynamic luxury RV resorts. Whether you're joining us for a weekend car show or planning an extended stay, our team is ready to help you make the most of your Florida RV resort experience. Call 352-429-2116 or visit our website to secure your spot in paradise.
